body: So, I remember a week ago, you told me that `miopen` was API compatible with `cudnn`, and so we were going to regex our way to victory. In this PR, I see a copy of code for `miopen`, which is basically copied straight from the existing cudnn bindings. What constraints changed that lead us here?
body_html: So, I remember a week ago, you told me that miopen was API compatible with cudnn, and so we were going to regex our way to victory. In this PR, I see a copy of code for miopen, which is basically copied straight from the existing cudnn bindings. What constraints changed that lead us here?
body_text: So, I remember a week ago, you told me that miopen was API compatible with cudnn, and so we were going to regex our way to victory. In this PR, I see a copy of code for miopen, which is basically copied straight from the existing cudnn bindings. What constraints changed that lead us here?
